GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article which corresponds to the parameterised id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves a list of comment objects which are all of the comments relating to a given article id

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!

comments.author: icellusedkars
comments.body: The owls are not what they seem.

POST /api/articles/:articleid/comments.description: creates and returns a new comment object for a given user and article
